projects.title: InfiniteRecon
projects.description: A modern take on the CIAs old Infinity transmitter using ESP32-S3 and INMP441 I2S MEMS microphone. Features real-time audio streaming, speech-to-text, speaker identification, and configurable alerts via a web dashboard.

projects.title: Magnetorquer Optimization Tool
projects.description: Tool for optimizing PCB magnetorquer coils by calculating optimal trace widths to maximize magnetic moment. Considers constraints like trace spacing, current density, and power limitations.

projects.title: Centurion
projects.description: An experimental cryptocurrency token with a unique twist - only 100 coins exist! A fun project exploring blockchain technology with artificial scarcity.

projects.title: HiveHub
projects.description: AI-powered beehive monitoring system using ESP8266 and environmental sensors. Features real-time alerts via mobile app and ChatGPT API integration for intelligent monitoring.

projects.title: Pathfinder
projects.description: School safety system using microcontrollers and sensors for gunshot detection and smart evacuation guidance. Features LED-based pathfinding and real-time threat response.

projects.title: GyroWing
projects.description: World's first active gyrating motorcycle wing for enhanced aerodynamic stability. Uses custom algorithms on ESP32 and Raspberry Pi with real-time sensor feedback.
